title: QuickHunt
tag: A platform designed to streamline the process of finding rental properties.
description: I developed QuickHunt to streamline the process of finding rental properties. The project was inspired by challenges I and many people I know have faced in the market. The platform includes user authentication and authorization, and personalized user profiles with listings. Key features include property listing with multiple image uploads, internal messaging,and the ability to share listings on social media.
